INTERNAL - API Retrieve Day-Ahead Market Prices for a Specific Country

Source: R/entsoe_api.R
api_entsoe_dam_prices.Rd

This function retrieves Day-Ahead Market (DAM) prices for a specific country from the ENTSOE Transparency Platform API. The function fetches market price data for a given time range and country, processes the data, and formats it into a data.table.

Usage

api_entsoe_dam_prices(
  country,
  from_data,
  to_data,
  api_key = Sys.getenv("ENTSOE_KEY")
)

Arguments

country

A character string specifying the country for which to retrieve DAM prices. The country should match an entry in the entsoe_countries table.

from_data

A Date object specifying the start date for the data range. Default is 365 days before the current date.

to_data

A Date object specifying the end date for the data range. Default is the current date.

api_key

A character string containing the ENTSOE API key. It can be passed directly or retrieved from the environment variable ENTSOE_KEY.

Value

A data.table containing the formatted DAM price data for the specified country and time range. The data table includes:

  • DATE: The date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

  • HOUR: The hour of the day (position in the data).

  • VALUE: The price value in EUR.

  • UNIT: The unit of the price (always 'EUR').
